data.polling: The polling interval for all devices

data.log_response_data: Log response data additionally in DEBUG

data.connect_timeout: Timeout for a connection to the endpoint

error.invalid_api_key: This message will be displayed if `invalid_api_key` is returned as a flow error.

abort.stale_api_key: This message will be displayed if `stale_api_key` is returned as the abort reason.

progress.slow_task: This message will be displayed if `slow_task` is returned as `progress_action` for `async_show_progress`.
